General.Name: Hunan Fangsheng Pharm Co Ltd
General.Description: Hunan Fangsheng Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells pharmaceutical products in China. It offers medicines in the form of tablets, capsules, and granules for the treatment of orthopedic, cardiovascular and cerebrovascular, anti-infection, pediatric, gynecological, respiratory system, traumatology, and other diseases. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Changsha, China.
